email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

We are looking to ship 50,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai in December. Could you provide a freight rate and vessel availability for this shipment? We prefer CIF terms.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN STAR, with a laycan of December 10-15. The freight rate is $25/MT on a CIF basis. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Lee
Global Freight Network

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of $25/MT seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider $22/MT? Also, could you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

We can adjust the rate to $23/MT, which is our best offer. The MV OCEAN STAR has a DWT of 75,000 and an LOA of 225 meters. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Michael,

We accept your offer of $23/MT. Please proceed with the booking for MV OCEAN STAR with a laycan of December 10-15. Could you also provide the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Thank you for your confirmation. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. I will send the booking confirmation shortly.

Best regards,
Michael
